channel.title: Skillcapes
channel.description: How do i make it so you have to have the 99 to wear the cape and where do i put the code if there is one?

item.title: Skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

If you’re using delta-based then it’s in wearing.java.

An example of a skillcape 99 in Attack.

If you wish to make a skill cape require 99 attack to weild then you would search for “clattack” and you should see something like :

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

scroll down untill you see the else if statments and then just add you’re code underneath one of them, so it should look like this.

 else if (ItemName.startsWith("Attack Cape")) {
			return 99; // Giving the skillcape a value of 99 in attack, meaning you're need 99 attack to weild it
		}

Read full topic
